price: 59. „(Visi) išskyrus Lūto (Loto) šeima. Juos visus mes tikrai išgelbėsime (nuo sunaikinimo).
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
